name: Class
description:
This **class selector** will match every element which has a certain class.
[info]This selector is the same as the more complicate [`CSS2 attribute selector (Whitespace)`](https://css4-selectors.com/selector/css2/attribute/#whitespace-class 'CSS2: Attribute').[/info]
example_description: In this example will every element with the class of `alert` will get a red border with an pink background.
